jobDescription: QualificationsMust be at least 18 years of age.Must have a valid Drivers LicenseAbility to work nights, weekends and holiday periods to meet business needs.Ability to pass a mandatory (or random) drug test, per Company policy, unless prohibited by state or provincial law.Ability to pass a background check, if 18 years of age or older, which may include, but is not limited to, credit, criminal, DMV, previous employment, education and personal references, per Company policy, unless prohibited by federal, state, or provincial law.Ability to obtain a California's Food Handler certificate.ResponsibilitiesUses basic math for inventory purposes.Ensures all equipment is operated in a safe and proper manner.Performs all job duties in a safe manner.Keeps work areas clean and organized.Notifies Supervisor of any malfunctions or safety concerns.Takes appropriate action to resolve issues.Stocks products in their respective locations to ensure organization and efficient inventory.Takes the initiative to work on other projects with all CGA staffPerforms other duties as assigned.
